title: Saving Liam
description: He went from homeless to porn star. Now, he's a prisoner. Liam's life in gay porn is far from glamorous. Saved from the streets of Vancouver as a young teen, he thought his life was turning around. Now heâ€™s trapped in a new hell with little chance of escape.Justin has loved Liam from afar for years. Oblivious to Liam's secret career, he's content to be a neighbor with a crush until the truth stumbles drunkenly into his apartment one night. As Liam's nightmare grows darker, Justin must find a way to rescue him before it's too late.Saving Liam is the first installment of a four-book series that features gritty realism, compelling characters, bittersweet romance, and sinfully-addictive writing.Buy this book today to read a heartbreaking story of second chances that needs to be told!
author: D.P. Denman
